experience.title: Senior Software Developer
responsibilities: Collaborate with over a dozen members of the USDA and FIANP to determine changes necessary for maintaining legacy applications and developing new applications.
Mentor multiple student and Junior level developers.
Analyze user needs and software requirements to determine feasibility of design within time and cost constraints.

experience.title: Senior Web Developer
responsibilities: Performed or directed website updates to 3 different corporate sites.
Created an internal corporate dashboard to save on Sharepoint licensing costs.
Negotiated with social media departments and users to prioritize development needs and choose solutions.
Evaluated code to ensure that it was valid, properly structured, met industry standards and was compatible with modern browsers, devices, and operating systems.
Developed a custom in-house APIs used to incorporate three 3rd-party APIs into legacy and new software solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
responsibilities: Architected two tablet, two mobile applications, and system backends for use by two sales teams.
Built web-service integrations to over 5 corporate services, such as Capital One, FATCO, SPI, DAE, and LeisureLink.
Designed and developed one public facing reservations systems and two public facing websites.
Modified existing software to correct errors, adapt it to new hardware, and improve performance.

experience.title: Senior Web Application Developer
responsibilities: Met with over a dozen clients to discuss needs and develop custom web applications.
Created WSDL and RESTful web services for both the public and corporate employees.
Conceptualized, coded, and maintained six corporate web sites, using authoring or scripting languages, content creation tools, and management tools.
Researched, documented, rated, and selected alternatives for web architecture or technologies.
Recommended new technologies and trained employees on use after implementation.
